source: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_SEQ_00<tab>Rolfe Hawthorne, patriarch of the beekeeping Hawthorne family, is said to be well versed in sylphic customs.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_SEQ_00<tab>ホウソーンの山塞の主人ロルフ・ホウソーンは、シルフ族の習慣について詳しいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_SEQ_01<tab>Rolfe's memory is not what it used to be, but it turns out that he has previously shared his stories with those around the hut. Check in with his daughter Ysabel and a couple of the patrolling sentries, Blaisette and Monne. They may remember what the old storyteller has forgotten.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_SEQ_01<tab>ロルフ・ホウソーンによると、この辺りの人々は皆、シルフ族の習慣に詳しいらしい。ホウソーンの山塞付近にいる「イサベル・ホウソーン」「ブレゼット」「モヌ」から、シルフ族について教えてもらおう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_SEQ_02<tab>You have gleaned that the sylphs are known for their mischievous and capricious nature, as they show little regard for Gridanian propriety or etiquette. Share your rediscovered tales with Rolfe Hawthorne.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_SEQ_02<tab>シルフ族は人間にとっての常識が通じず、いたずら好きだということがわかった。ホウソーンの山塞の「ロルフ・ホウソーン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_SEQ_03<tab>Your findings have served to stir Rolfe's memory, and he recalls that dancing is the traditional greeting among the sylphs. It would seem they are a most curious tribe, indeed.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_SEQ_03<tab>ロルフ・ホウソーンによると、シルフ族にとっての挨拶は、踊ることだという。シルフ族は、本当に変わった習慣をもっているようだ。
TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_TODO_00<tab>イサベル・ホウソーンと話す
TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_TODO_03<tab>ロルフ・ホウソーンに報告

source: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_ROLFE_000_000<tab>Come to learn a thing or two about the sylphs, have you? I'll tell you one thing, they're a peculiar folk. How peculiar, you ask? Well, just let me tell you!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_ROLFE_000_000シルフ族の習慣について知りたいのかい？
ならば、彼らの習慣について学んでいくといい。
なにせ彼らは、とびきりの変わり者だからな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_ROLFE_000_001<tab>They're... They're... Er... <sigh> Beg pardon, friend. My memory's just not what it used to be. I've seen much and more in my adventuring days, and it's all a clutter in my noggin now. Though, I've shared my stories with those around the hut before. You might have more luck with them.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_ROLFE_000_001この辺りの者は皆、シルフ族との付き合い方は承知済みさ。
シルフ族の習慣については、皆に聞いてみるといい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_YSABEL_000_010<tab>The sylphs? Yes, Father's told me his stories <var 1A 02 /var>plenty<var 1A 01 /var> of times. What I've always found most captivating is how their concept of etiquette is almost completely alien to our own.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_YSABEL_000_010シルフ族は、私達とはまったく違う倫理観をもっているの。
私達にとっての「常識」は、彼らには通用しないわ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_YSABEL_000_011<tab>You'd do best not to underestimate them on account of their childlike looks, lest your face end up a mess of glyphs, squiggles, and chocobo scratches. Tee hee!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_YSABEL_000_011可愛い見た目をしているからって、油断しちゃだめよ。
気を抜くと顔に落書きされちゃうんだから。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_BLAISETTE_000_015<tab>The quickest way to a Quiverwoman's heart might be through her stomach, but don't even think of trying to foist your foodstuffs on a sylph. They sustain themselves simply by bathing in the sun, or so Rolfe once told me.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_BLAISETTE_000_015食べ物を使い、シルフ族を手なずけようとするのは愚行だ。
奴等にとっては「光を浴びること」が食事と同義なのだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_MONNE_000_020<tab>The sylphs? Inveterate tricksters and troublemakers, that's what they are! One day they're drawing morbol faces on our masks, the next they're sending our young sentries falling to the bottom of a ravine!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_MONNE_000_020シルフ族はいたずらが大好きよ。
私達の仮面に落書きをすることから、
巡回中の歩哨を谷底に突き落とすことまであるわ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_MONNE_000_021<tab>Tell them to stop and they just laugh at you. Rolfe claims they harbor no ill will, but I daresay such pranks are no laughing matter.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_MONNE_000_021危険なことはやめてくれって彼らに伝えても、
シルフ族にはそもそも悪気がないから、
全然わかってくれないのよね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_ROLFE_000_030<tab>Oh, of course, of course! Hearing your stories─well, <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> stories─has brought the memories flooding back to me. I feel...I feel like <var 1A 02 /var>dancing<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_ROLFE_000_030どうだ、皆に聞いてわかっただろう？
シルフ族は我々とまったく異なる文化をもっているのさ。
例えば「挨拶」なんかは……これだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_ROLFE_000_031<tab>Yes, nothing brings people together quite like a little toe-tapping. A sylph told me long ago that dancing is a time-honored greeting among their kind. You'd do well to remember this─it just may help win the favor of our forest friends.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA003_00709_ROLFE_000_031シルフ族にとってはこれ……つまり「踊る」ことが挨拶さ。
彼らと会うつもりなら、覚えておくといいだろう。
